title: Juan Andrés Sarulyte
text:
Juan Andrés Sarulyte (born 18 April 1962) is a former <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player and currently manager.
On April 23, 2012, he was announced that he will be the <a href="assistant%20coach">assistant coach</a> to complete the coaching squad under the strategist <a href="Rub%C3%A9n%20Israel">Rubén Israel</a> for the <a href="El%20Salvador%20national%20football%20team">El Salvador national football team</a>, chosen by Executive Comite of FESFUT.
